name: Free VPN for Chrome: Secure VPN Proxy in One Click
summary: Routes ALL user traffic through 9 hardcoded suspicious proxy domains on disposable TLDs (.space, .club, .site). Blocks Google Analytics, Amplitude, PostHog, Mixpanel, and Chrome update/SafeBrowsing infrastructure via declarativeNetRequest. Makes false AES-256 encryption claims. Injects SweetAlert2 on all pages with no apparent usage.

vulnerabilities.title: Suspicious Proxy Infrastructure
vulnerabilities.description: Routes all traffic through 9 unverified proxy servers on disposable TLDs enabling potential full MITM on user traffic.

vulnerabilities.title: Chrome Safety Infrastructure Blocking
vulnerabilities.description: Blocks clients*.google.com (Chrome update/SafeBrowsing), Google Analytics, Amplitude, PostHog, and Mixpanel via declarativeNetRequest rules.

flags.description: Routes all traffic through 9 suspicious unverified proxy domains on disposable TLDs
Injects SweetAlert2 library on all pages at document_start with no clear usage -- potential placeholder for future injection
